dusk.description: Check that all eyes are closed. Some Fabled act.

philosopher.description: The Philosopher might choose a character. If necessary, swap their character token. ⚫

alchemist.description: Show the YOU ARE token & the Character token of a not in play Minion

poppygrower.description: Do not do the Minion Info & Demon Info steps. Wake the Demon, show the THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY info token & any three good character tokens that are not in play.

magician.description: Include the Magician in the Minion & Demon Info steps.

minion_info.description: If there are 7 or more players, wake all Minions: Show the THIS IS THE DEMON token. Point to the Demon. Show the THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS token. Point to the other Minions.

snitch.description: Wake each Minion. Show the THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY token & three not-in-play character tokens. Put each Minion to sleep.

lunatic.description: If there are 7 or more players, wake the Lunatic: Show the THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS token. Point to any players. Show the THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY token. Show 3 good character tokens. Put the Lunatic to sleep. Wake the Demon. Show the YOU ARE info token & the Demon token. Show the THIS PLAYER IS info token & the Lunatic token, then point to the Lunatic.

demon_info.description: If there are 7 or more players, wake the Demon: Show the THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS token. Point to all Minions. Show the THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY token Show 3 not-in-play good characters.

king.description: Wake the Demon. Show the THIS PLAYER IS token & the King Token, then point to the King.

sailor.description: The Sailor chooses a living player. ⚫

marionette.description: Wake the Demon. Point to the player marked IS THE MARIONETTE & show the THIS PLAYER IS token & the Marionette character token.

engineer.description:
The Engineer might choose Minions or Demons. ⚫ If they do: 
	Put the Engineer to sleep. Wake a targer, show them the YOU ARE token & their new character token, then put that target to sleep. Repeat for all players that changed characters.

preacher.description:
The Preacher chooses a player. ⚫ If they chose a Minion: 
	Put the Preacher to sleep. Wake the target. Show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU token & the Preacher token.

lilmonsta.description: Wake all Minions, allow them to choose a babysitter. ⚫

widow.description: Show the Grimoire for as long as the Widow needs. The Widow chooses a player. ⚫

courtier.description: The Courtier might choose a character. ⚫⚫

snakecharmer.description:
The Snake Charmer chooses a player. If they chose the Demon: 
	Show the YOU ARE & Demon tokens. Give a thumbs down. Swap the Snake Charmer & Demon tokens. Put the old Snake Charmer to sleep. Wake the old Demon. Show the YOU ARE & Snake Charmer tokens & give a thumbs up. ⚫

godfather.description: Show the character tokens of all in-play Outsiders

devilsadvocate.description: The Devil's Advocate chooses a living player. ⚫

eviltwin.description: Wake both twins. Allow eye contact. Show the good twin's character to the Evil Twin & vice versa.

cerenovus.description: The Cerenovus chooses a player & a character. ⚫ Put the Cerenovus to sleep. Wake the target. Show the THIS CHARACTER HAS SELECTED YOU token, the Cerenovus token, then the madness-character token.

fearmonger.description: The Fearmonger chooses a player. ⚫ Declare that 'The Fearmonger has chosen a player.'

harpy.description: The Harpy chooses two players. ⚫⚫ Put the Harpy to sleep. Wake the 1st target. Show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU token, the Harpy token, then point to the 2nd target.

pixie.description: Show the Townsfolk character token marked MAD.

damsel.description: Wake each Minion. Show the Damsel token. Put each Minion to sleep.

washerwoman.description: Show the Townsfolk character token. Point to both the TOWNSFOLK & WRONG players.

librarian.description: Show the Outsider character token. Point to both the OUTSIDER & WRONG players.

investigator.description: Show the Minion character token. Point to both the MINION & WRONG players.

fortuneteller.description: The Fortune Teller chooses 2 players. Nod if either is the Demon (or the RED HERRING).

grandmother.description: Point to the grandchild player & show their character token.

dreamer.description: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good & 1 evil character token, 1 of which is their character.

seamstress.description: The Seamstress might choose 2 players. Nod or shake your head. ⚫

steward.description: Point to the good player marked KNOW.

knight.description: Point to the two non-Demon players marked KNOW.

noble.description: Point to all three players marked KNOW.

shugenja.description: Point clockwise or anticlockwise around the circle

nightwatchman.description: The Nightwatchman might choose a player. ⚫ Put the Nightwatchman to sleep. Wake the target & show the THIS PLAYER IS & Nightwatchman tokens & point to the Nightwatchman.

cultleader.description: The Cult Leader might change alignment. If so, show the YOU ARE info token & a thumbs up or down for their new alignment.

spy.description: Show the Grimoire for as long as the Spy needs.

chambermaid.description: The Chambermaid chooses 2 living players. Give a finger signal.

dawn.description: Wait for a few seconds. Call for eyes open.

leviathan.description: Declare that 'The Leviathan is in play.' Mark the Leviathan with the DAY 1 reminder. ⚫

vizier.description: Announce the Vizier player to the group.

travelers.description:
Tell any new travelers their alignment by showing the YOU ARE token & a thumbs up or down. If they are evil: 
	Show the THIS IS THE DEMON token. Point to the Demon. Any night actions by travelers should be done now.

kazali.description: Wake the Kazali, allow them to choose Minions.

villageidiot.description: Choose a Village Idiot to be drunk. Wake the Village Idiots one at a time, they choose a player, show either good or evil thumbs according to the alignment of that player.

yaggababble.description: Choose a secret phrase. Wake the Yaggababble & let them know their secret  phrase.

summoner.description: Show the THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY token. Show 3 not-in-play good character tokens.

ogre.description: The Ogre points to a player.

lordoftyphon.description: Replace neighbors of the Lord of Typhon with Minions, wake them, tell them their new alignment & character, then do minion info.

boffin.description: Wake the Boffin & the Demon. Show the not-in-play good character token. Put the Boffin & the Demon to sleep.

xaan.description: Mark the Xaan with the NIGHT 1 reminder. If X is 1, mark the Xaan with the X reminder token. ⚫ ⚫

wizard.description: Run the Wizard's ability, if applicable.

philosopher.description: The Philosopher might choose a character. If necessary, swap their character token. ⚫

poppygrower.description: If the Poppy Grower died today or tonight, wake the Minions, show the THIS IS THE DEMON info token & point to the Demon. Put them to sleep. Wake the Demon, show the THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS info token & point to the minions. Put the Demon to sleep.

sailor.description: The Sailor chooses a living player. ⚫

engineer.description:
The Engineer might choose Minions or Demons. ⚫ If they do: 
	Put the Engineer to sleep. Wake a targer, show them the YOU ARE token & their new character token, then put that target to sleep. Repeat for all players that changed characters.

preacher.description:
The Preacher chooses a player. ⚫ If they chose a Minion: 
	Put the Preacher to sleep. Wake the target. Show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU token & the Preacher token.

courtier.description: The Courtier might choose a character. ⚫⚫

gambler.description: The Gambler chooses a player & a character. ⚫

snakecharmer.description:
The Snake Charmer chooses a player. If they chose the Demon: 
	Show the YOU ARE & Demon tokens. Give a thumbs down. Swap the Snake Charmer & Demon tokens. Put the old Snake Charmer to sleep. Wake the old Demon. Show the YOU ARE & Snake Charmer tokens & give a thumbs up. ⚫

devilsadvocate.description: The Devil's Advocate chooses a living player. ⚫

cerenovus.description: The Cerenovus chooses a player & a character. ⚫ Put the Cerenovus to sleep. Wake the target. Show the THIS CHARACTER HAS SELECTED YOU token, the Cerenovus token, then the madness-character token.

pithag.description:
The Pit-Hag chooses a player & a character. If they chose a character that is not in play: 
	Put the Pit-Hag to sleep. Wake the target. Show the YOU ARE token & their new character token.

fearmonger.description: The Fearmonger chooses a player. ⚫ If the player wasn't already marked with the FEAR reminder, declare that 'The Fearmonger has chosen a player'

harpy.description: The Harpy chooses two players. ⚫⚫ Put the Harpy to sleep. Wake the 1st target. Show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU token, the Harpy token, then point to the 2nd target.

mezepheles.description: If a player is marked with the TURNS EVIL reminder, wake them. Show the YOU ARE info token & a thumbs down. The Mezepheles loses their ability. ⚫

scarletwoman.description: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today, show them the YOU ARE token, then the Demon Character token.

lunatic.description: Do whatever needs to be done to simulate the Demon acting. Put the Lunatic to sleep. Wake the Demon. Show the Lunatic token & point to them, then their target(s).

exorcist.description:
The Exorcist chooses a player. ⚫ Put the Exorcist to sleep. If the Exorcist chose the Demon:
	 Wake the Demon. Show the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU & Exorcist tokens. Point to the Exorcist.

imp.description:
The Imp chooses a player. ⚫ If the Imp chose themselves: 
	Replace 1 alive Minion token with a spare Imp token. Put the old Imp to sleep. Wake the new Imp. Show the YOU ARE token, then show the Imp token.

zombuul.description: If no one died today, the Zombuul chooses a player. ⚫

pukka.description: The Pukka chooses a player. ⚫ The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy. ⚫

shabaloth.description: A previously chosen player might be resurrected. ⚫ The Shabaloth chooses 2 players. ⚫⚫

po.description: The Po may choose a player OR chooses 3 players if they chose no-one last night. ⚫ or ⚫⚫⚫

fanggu.description:
The Fang Gu chooses a player. ⚫ If they chose an Outsider (once only): 
	Replace the Outsider token with the spare Fang Gu token. Put the Fang Gu token to sleep. Wake the target. Show the YOU ARE & Fang Gu tokens & give a thumbs-down. ⚫

nodashii.description: The No Dashii chooses a player. ⚫

vigormortis.description: The Vigormortis chooses a player. ⚫ If that player is a Minion, poison a neighboring Townsfolk. ⚫⚫

alhadikhia.description: The Al-Hadikhia chooses three players. ⚫⚫⚫ Wake the player marked 1 & say 'The Al-Hadikhia has chosen', then the player's name, then 'Do you choose to live?' They either nod or shake their head. Put them to sleep & add or remove shrouds accordingly. Repeat for players marked 2 & 3. If all three players are now alive, add a shroud to all three.

lilmonsta.description: Wake all Minions, allow them to choose a babysitter.⚫ A player might die. ⚫

assassin.description: The Assassin might choose a player. ⚫⚫

godfather.description: If an Outsider died today, the Godfather chooses a player. ⚫

gossip.description: If the Gossip is due to kill a player, they die. ⚫

barber.description: If the Barber died today or tonight, show the Demon the THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU & Barber tokens. If the Demon chose 2 players, wake one at a time. Show the YOU ARE token & their new character token.

sweetheart.description: If the Sweetheart died, a player became drunk immediately. If you haven't done this yet, do so now. ⚫

sage.description: If the Demon killed the Sage, wake the Sage & point to 2 players, 1 of which is the Demon.

professor.description: The Professor might choose a dead player. ⚫⚫

choirboy.description: If the Demon killed the King, point to the Demon player.

huntsman.description:
The Huntsman might choose a player. ⚫ If that player was the Damsel: 
	Put the Huntsman to sleep. Wake the Damsel & show them the YOU ARE info token & their new character token.

damsel.description: If the Damsel was chosen by the Huntsman, show them the YOU ARE info token & their new character token.

farmer.description: If the Farmer died tonight, wake an alive good player. Show them the YOU ARE info token & a Farmer character token. Replace their previous token with the Farmer token.

moonchild.description: If the Moonchild is due to kill a good player, they die. ⚫

grandmother.description: If the grandchild was killed by the Demon, the Grandmother dies too. ⚫

ravenkeeper.description: If the Ravenkeeper died tonight, the Ravenkeeper chooses a player. Show that player's character token.

fortuneteller.description: The Fortune Teller chooses 2 players. Nod if either is the Demon (or the RED HERRING).

undertaker.description: If a player was executed today, show their character token.

dreamer.description: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good & 1 evil character token, 1 of which is their character.

flowergirl.description: Either nod or shake your head.

towncrier.description: Either nod or shake your head.

seamstress.description: The Seamstress might choose 2 players. Nod or shake your head. ⚫

balloonist.description: Show a player with a different character type to previously ⚫

king.description: If the dead equal or outnumber the living, show the character token of an alive player.

bountyhunter.description: If the KNOWN player died today or tonight, point to a new KNOWN player.

nightwatchman.description: The Nightwatchman might choose a player. ⚫ Put the Nightwatchman to sleep. Wake the target & show the THIS PLAYER IS & Nightwatchman tokens & point to the Nightwatchman.

cultleader.description: The Cult Leader might change alignment. If so, show the YOU ARE info token & a thumbs up or down for their new alignment.

spy.description: Show the Grimoire for as long as the Spy needs.

chambermaid.description: The Chambermaid chooses 2 living players. Give a finger signal.

dawn.description: Wait for a few seconds. End the Night Phase.

leviathan.description: Optionally, declare that 'The Leviathan is in play.' Replace the reminder token. ⚫

hatter.description: Wake Minions & Demons, allow them to choose new characters.

travelers.description:
Tell any new travelers their alignment by showing the YOU ARE token & a thumbs up or down. If they are evil: 
	Show the THIS IS THE DEMON token. Point to the Demon. Any night actions by travelers should be done now.

villageidiot.description: Wake the Village Idiots one at a time, they choose a player, show either good or evil thumbs according to the alignment of that player.

yaggababble.description: For each time the Yaggababble said the phrase today, you may choose a player. They die. ⚫

summoner.description: Change the Summoner reminder token to the relevant night. If it is night 3, the Summoner chooses a player & a Demon. Put the Summoner to sleep. Wake the chosen player. Show the YOU ARE token, a thumbs  down & the chosen Demon token.

banshee.description: If the Banshee was killed by the Demon tonight, announce to all players that the Banshee has died. ⚫

lordoftyphon.description: The Lord of Typhon chooses a player. ⚫

xaan.description: Change the Xaan reminder token to the relevant night. If it is night X, mark the Xaan with the X reminder token. ⚫ ⚫

wizard.description: Run the Wizard's ability, if applicable.
